name: Crooked Waters
description: Crooked Waters is a multiplayer virtual reality game where you and your pirate crew participate in thrilling sea battles. Play with random players or join up with your friends to fight other crews using your ship.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 or higher Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1100 MB available space Additional Notes: Vive HMD and controllers
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1500 MB available space Additional Notes: Vive HMD and controllers
